other_tests.findings: Extensive fat stranding and multiple locules of free air in the mesentery in the right iliac fossa. Loculated fluid collection measuring 3.5 x 2.8 cm in the right iliac fossa. Wall thickening of the lower ascending colon, cecum, and terminal ileum. No suspicious pulmonary nodules. Multiple subcentimeter hypoattenuating lesions in both kidneys likely representing simple renal cortical cysts. A well-defined fat-containing lesion in the right adnexa consistent with a right ovarian teratoma.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The inflammatory process and the fluid collection have considerably decreased since the earlier study from ___ where the collection measured 5.3 x 4.5 cm.
